title: Broken Game?
body:
Hello, I just downloaded the game recently AKA yesterday, but I've been having issues with it working. I've had to un-install and re-install the game at least 5 times after I log off my laptop. I don't know if it has to do with the fact that I am not playing on a PC or if Mac's are not too compatible with the game. I am re-installing it as I type this. 
Let me know what can be done, Thank you!
<3

replies.body: Mac's can definitely run League, but what kind of problems are you having specifically? It's a little hard to know where I should start troubleshooting without knowing what's going wrong.
